description: WinOptimizer appends the part number to the end of the filename when creating split archive parts. For example, MyMovie.wmv would have parts MyMovie.wmv.part00000 , MyMovie.wmv.part00001 , MyMovie.wmv.part00002 , etc.
NOTE: Split archives are used for separating large files into smaller parts for storage on floppy disks, CDs, and DVDs.
